pages.title: Automatic Sandwich Making
pages.text: Making sandwiches manually is fun, and a great way to start your Minecraft day. But after a while, it may become quite tedious. This design for an automatic sandwich maker uses a sandwich table minecart to make sandwiches. The machine is fully automatic!

pages.title: Instructions
pages.text: Step-by-step instructions to build your machine. Place the framed items in the corresponding dispensers.
